ygData.subject: Re: Travel Tips - FP & Qeynos
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Trust me, there s PLENTY of room. TONS of it. You d have to specifically want to go to the gypsies to hit them. There s so much space you can go on either
ygData.messageBody:
> How does an evil race player make this journey?
> It seems impossible to me. I've never been through
> the Rathetear areas as of yet, so I don't know if
> there's room to run around the Gypsies or not..
> But from the map I've seen, it doesn't look like
> there is.

Trust me, there's PLENTY of room. TONS of it. You'd have to specifically
want to go to the gypsies to hit them. There's so much space you can go on
either side of them (between them and the wall, or around the outside).

Rathetear mountains were made to be the route for evil races. =) Besides,
even if they couldn't, there's a good old thing known as invis =)
